snippet: The arrests represent another case highlighting the attraction of jihadist groups for some disaffected young Europeans.
abstract: Three British teenagers are arrested on suspicion of intention to commit terrorist acts after being detained in Turkey, believed to be en route to Syria.
lead_paragraph: The arrests represent another case highlighting the attraction of jihadist groups for some disaffected young Europeans.

headline.main: 3 British Teenagers Detained on Suspicion of Plotting Terror
headline.print_headline: 3 British Teenagers Detained on Suspicion of Plotting Terror
